messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to April Construct LV. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in April Construct LV door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on April Construct LV have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to April Construct LV. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Atmospherics alert

The scrubbers network is experiencing a backpressure surge. Some ejection of contents may occur.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard April Construct LV. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: there appears to be a blob on the station whelp.. good luck

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Russian Outreach Program

Cargo: A group of angry Russians want to have a party. Can you send them your cargo shuttle then make them disappear?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have designated your bridge as the new engine

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in April Construct LV's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: you guys should pick up those guns in the shuttle... you will need them.
